Content.Text:
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome!
This is the <GREEN>Tea House</GREEN>.
Please place your order.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Please have a seat here and wait
while I prepare it.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're not going to order?
Next time, then!
